name: fprodsplit1
params: setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0
body: |- wi(w0, wceq(cprod(s0, c0, c1), co(c2, cmul, cprod(s0, cdif(c0, csn(c3)), c1))))

stmt.origin: fprodsplit1f(s0, c0, c1, c2, c3, w0)

|- wi(w0, wceq(cprod(s0, c0, c1), co(c2, cmul, cprod(s0, cdif(c0, csn(c3)), c1))))

-| wi(wa(w0, wceq(cv(s0), c3)), wceq(c1, c2))
-| diffsc(s0, c0)
-| diffsc(s0, c3)
